about_the_game:
This is A Post-apocalyptic, High-Freedom, Sandbox Survival Game:

In a near-future wasteland, resources are scarce, and danger lurks at every corner. You play as a survivor, scavenging, crafting, and exploring the open world in search of ways to stay alive. Along the way, you will encounter NPCs who are also struggling to survive in this harsh environment. You can choose to cooperate or confront them, help the weak or plunder others... Every decision you make will shape your unique journey through the wasteland.

  • Dynamic NPC World
    The game features randomly generated NPCs who make decisions based on their needs and past experiences, such as cooperation, trade, revenge, or plunder. Each NPC can become either your ally or your enemy.

  • High-Freedom Gameplay
    Explore a seamless, open-world sandbox map, discover resource points, engage in trade, and craft equipment. (Coming soon) Alternatively, you can join different factions and enforce your own survival rules.

  • Real-time Combat System
    The real-time combat system requires you to strategically equip yourself and your NPC companions with the right weapons and gear to overcome various enemies.

  • Trading and Economic System
    In addition to raiding enemy resource points for supplies, you'll need to understand market shifts caused by supply and demand to find the best strategies for survival in the resource-scarce wasteland.

  • Item Crafting
    By exploring and trading materials, you can craft advanced equipment to ensure the survival of yourself and your companions.
